page.title: 08GORDON ARMS BB
page.content: The owners of the Gordon Arms don,t get to bed until anything from 11.30pm to 2.00am.Working in a pub is hard work but enjoyable.The work includes serving at a bar, ordering, taking deliveries and general upkeep. The owners of the pub hardly get any freetime but all they get is spent with the family. They would not like another kind of job. The kind of work they do in the pub is barservice, cooking and keeping the rooms clean and tidy.There are three rooms for visitors.There is one double room and two single rooms which have a shower and a sink in them.The busiest time of the year is the summer.The Gordon Arms is a hotel for people that like peace and quite.From the hotel you can walk, go picnics,fish, horse ride and swim in the river.
